e8d0fb6c-c3dd-4bd4-bcc0-3060dc21f570.name: Frequency: Constantly

cecd8b56-7a63-4d0f-867b-926b00f5953f.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

aa07e2c0-c8e2-4873-b520-d8fda9460f7a.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

95a87d09-e156-4f98-a7c2-edbd7869e8d8.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

6e9e3dd4-5498-4881-bd46-564677944690.name: Frequency: Monthly
6e9e3dd4-5498-4881-bd46-564677944690.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

cff1268f-301e-4143-96f6-266b51ef80a1.name: Frequency: Seasonally

bc236bd2-cef0-4618-a1fe-ef07255ad47c.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

029620a6-31ef-46ac-afff-8c5f7dc409ae.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency
